LanguageData.AnimaTreeLinking.roles.0.label: დამაკავშირებელი
LanguageData.ThroneSpeech.letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} is giving a speech from the throne. \nIf all goes well, listeners will feel inspired, and gain respect for {ORGANIZER_labelShort}. If it goes poorly, the speech will do social damage. The outcome depends on {ORGANIZER_labelShort}'s social abilities.
LanguageData.ThroneSpeech.roles.0.label: ორგანიზატორი
